buildStep.command:
# Make clean builds for daily builds by removing build folder
rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/libweintek/build/jenkins rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/dserver/build/jenkins rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/gui/build/jenkins rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/viewer/build/jenkins

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Do static analysis by cppcheck echo "================================ cppcheck ================================ cppcheck ================================ cppcheck ================================"
rm -rf cppcheck mkdir cppcheck cd cppcheck
cppcheck --enable=all --inconclusive --xml --xml-version=2 \ --suppress=syntaxError \ --suppress=unusedFunction \ --suppress=unusedPrivateFunction \ ${WORKSPACE}/libweintek/weintek \ ${WORKSPACE}/dserver/dserver \ ${WORKSPACE}/gui/got \ ${WORKSPACE}/viewer/CloudHmi \ 2> cppcheck-result.xml

#!/bin/bash
# Build dserver echo "================================ dserver ================================ dserver ================================ dserver ================================"
export DSERVER_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/dserver export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/libweintek export MARIADB_CONNECTOR_C_PATH=/home/ci/work/mariadb-connector-c export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/${TRIGGER_PARAM_INSTALL_FOLDER}
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then export GOOGLE_BREAKPAD_PATH=/home/ci/work/cMT-SVR/google-breakpad fi
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT3000" ]; then export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi elif [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-iv5" ]; then export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT-iv5/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi fi
rm -f ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver* rm -rf ${DSERVER_PATH}/artifacts mkdir ${DSERVER_PATH}/artifacts
cd ${DSERVER_PATH}/build if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_DSERVER_BUILD_POLICY}" = "brandnew" ]; then rm -rf jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} fi if [ ! -d "jenkins" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins fi if [ ! -d "jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} fi cd jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}
${DSERVER_PATH}/build/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/cmake_dserver.sh ${DSERVER_PATH} ${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} ${MARIADB_CONNECTOR_C_PATH} ${GOOGLE_BREAKPAD_PATH} ${INSTALL_PREFIX} ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} RelWithDebInfo
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_DSERVER_BUILD_POLICY}" = "clean" ]; then make clean fi
make install VERBOSE=1 cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver ${DSERVER_PATH}/artifacts/dserver.RelWithDebInfo
make install/strip VERBOSE=1 if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "Ubuntu" ]; then export ENCRYPT_NAME=dserver else if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-SVR" ]; then export ENCRYPT_NAME=dserver.cmt elif [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-iv5" ]; then export ENCRYPT_NAME=dserver.iv5 else export ENCRYPT_NAME=dserver.c30 fi /home/ci/work/crypto e ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/dserver ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/${ENCRYPT_NAME} fi cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/${ENCRYPT_NAME} ${DSERVER_PATH}/artifacts

buildStep.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Build gui echo "================================ gui ================================ gui ================================ gui ================================"
export GUI_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/gui export DSERVER_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/dserver export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/libweintek export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/${TRIGGER_PARAM_INSTALL_FOLDER}
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT3000" ]; then export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi elif [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT-iv5" ]; then export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT-iv5/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi fi
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "Ubuntu" ]; then export PATH=/opt/Qt5.4.2/5.4/gcc_64/bin:${PATH} fi
rm -f ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui* rm -f ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/liblibgui20.a rm -rf ${GUI_PATH}/artifacts mkdir ${GUI_PATH}/artifacts
cd ${GUI_PATH}/build if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_GUI_BUILD_POLICY}" = "brandnew" ]; then rm -rf jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} fi if [ ! -d "jenkins" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins fi if [ ! -d "jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} fi cd jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}
cp ${GUI_PATH}/build/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/features.pri . ${GUI_PATH}/build/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/qmake_gui.sh ${GUI_PATH} ${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} ${DSERVER_PATH} ${INSTALL_PREFIX} ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} RelWithDebInfo
if test -n "${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN}"; then source ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} fi
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_GUI_BUILD_POLICY}" = "clean" ]; then make clean fi make VERBOSE=1
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "cMT3000" ]; then cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui ${GUI_PATH}/artifacts/gui.RelWithDebInfo strip ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui ${GUI_PATH}/artifacts test_mtcrypt --encrypt ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui --out ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui.c30 cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui.c30 ${GUI_PATH}/artifacts elif [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "Ubuntu" ]; then cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui ${GUI_PATH}/artifacts/gui.RelWithDebInfo strip ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/gui ${GUI_PATH}/artifacts fi

#!/bin/bash
# export variables
export VIEWER_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/viewer export CLOUDHMI_PATH=${VIEWER_PATH}/CloudHmi export LIBWEINTEK_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/libweintek export DSERVER_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/dserver export GUI_PATH=${WORKSPACE}/gui export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/${TRIGGER_PARAM_INSTALL_FOLDER}
case $TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM in "cMT-iv5") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT-iv5/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; "cMT-iv5-3000") export CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN=/home/ci/work/cMT3000/target/environment-setup-armv7ahf-vfp-neon-weintek-linux-gnueabi ;; esac
case $TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM in "cMT-iv5-3000") export PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER=cMT-iv5 ;; *) export PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER=${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} ;; esac
case $TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM in "cMT-iv5") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=.iv5 ;; "cMT-iv5-3000") export ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME=.iv5 ;; esac
if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" = "Ubuntu" ]; then export PATH=/opt/Qt5.4.2/5.4/gcc_64/bin:${PATH} fi
# clear artifacts
rm -f ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/CloudHmi* rm -f ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/cMTViewer* rm -rf ${VIEWER_PATH}/artifacts mkdir ${VIEWER_PATH}/artifacts
# prepare out-of-source build
cd ${VIEWER_PATH}/build if [ "${TRIGGER_PARAM_VIEWER_BUILD_POLICY}" = "brandnew" ]; then rm -rf jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} fi if [ ! -d "jenkins" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins fi if [ ! -d "jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}" ]; then mkdir -p jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM} fi cd jenkins/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}
# generate makefile
cp ${VIEWER_PATH}/build/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/*features.pri . ${VIEWER_PATH}/build/${PLATFORM_BUILD_FOLDER}/qmake_viewer.sh ${CLOUDHMI_PATH} ${LIBWEINTEK_PATH} ${DSERVER_PATH} ${GUI_PATH} ${INSTALL_PREFIX} ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} RelWithDebInfo
# make
if test -n "${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN}"; then source ${CROSS_COMPILER_TOOLCHAIN} fi make VERBOSE=1 cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/CloudHmi ${VIEWER_PATH}/artifacts/CloudHmi.RelWithDebInfo
# strip and encrypt
strip ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/CloudHmi tar -cv ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/CloudHmi >> ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/CloudHmi.tar if test -n "${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME}"; then test_mtcrypt --encrypt ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/CloudHmi.tar --out ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/cMTViewer${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME} cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/cMTViewer${ENCRYPT_EXTENSION_NAME} ${VIEWER_PATH}/artifacts else cp ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/CloudHmi.tar ${VIEWER_PATH}/artifacts fi

# Unit tests echo "================================ unit-test ================================ unit-test ================================ unit-test ================================"
export INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/ci/work/${TRIGGER_PARAM_PLATFORM}/${TRIGGER_PARAM_INSTALL_FOLDER}
rm -rf gtest mkdir gtest cd gtest
mkdir test-libweintek mkdir test-dserver mkdir test-got
cd ${WORKSPACE}/gtest/test-libweintek ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/test-libweintek --gtest_output=xml:${WORKSPACE}/gtest/gtest-libweintek.xml
cd ${WORKSPACE}/gtest/test-dserver ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/test-dserver --gtest_output=xml:${WORKSPACE}/gtest/gtest-dserver.xml
cd ${WORKSPACE}/gtest/test-got ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/test-got --gtest_output=xml:${WORKSPACE}/gtest/gtest-got.xml
